  RELEASE NOTES:

  Now let&#039;s go back to the arcade_ 

  In the beginning, there was Pong, the legendary, table-tennis-style video 
  game that ignited the industry. Now Pong is back for the PC, challenging 
  players once again to keep their reflexes sharp as they lob the ball back 
  and forth in pursuit of high score. Only this time, the lush 3D graphics, 
  all new paddles and unique features add a whole new element of challenge 
  to the game. Get your paddles ready !

  This game is of course different from any Pong game of the past (in case
  you are a braindead limey or frog).

  INSTALLATION:

  Unzip and unace (use ace.exe v1.2b like this: ace x -y pong.ace c:\pong\).
  Then unace the crack.ace to your game-dir. Doubleclick on the crack.reg. 
  Start the game with PCPong.exe.
  
  RIPPED:       

  Nothing.
